summary: Comprehensive testing completed for KEESO website updates. All backend APIs (21/21) passed successfully. Frontend testing shows excellent functionality with new slider feature (4 images), updated Kurumsal page, visit detail gallery, and all admin modules working correctly. Minor issue: Education page shows no training images because only 1 training exists in database without cover image.

backend_issues.notes: All 21 backend endpoints working perfectly. Added tests for trainings, press, condolences, and board-members APIs.

design_issues.issue: No training card images displayed because the existing training in database doesn't have a cover_image
design_issues.note: This is a data issue, not a code issue. The page correctly displays training cards with images when cover_image is present. Admin can add trainings with images via admin panel.

frontend_issues.notes: All forms, navigation, admin modules, and interactions working correctly. Homepage slider with 4 images working perfectly. Visit detail gallery with lightbox working. All admin modules accessible and functional.

passed_tests: Backend: Announcements CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete)
Frontend: Homepage loading with slider (4 images)
Frontend: Slider auto-rotation and manual navigation
Frontend: Kurumsal page with updated content
Frontend: Visit detail page with photo gallery (4 images)
Frontend: Footer social media links (Facebook, YouTube, Instagram)
Frontend: Education page structure and filtering
Admin: Eğitim ve Seminerler module with image upload (2 file fields)
Admin: Yönetim & Denetim Kurulu (Board Members) module
